SEARCH
Package KI304.Shevchuk.Lab2

Class AlpinistsEquipment

java.lang.Object
KI304.Shevchuk.Lab2.AlpinistsEquipment
public class AlpinistsEquipment extends Object
The AlpinistsEquipment class represents alpinist's equipment. It stores information about an equipment item, such as its name, weight, price, and description. The class provides methods to log equipment-related actions and inspect the equipment.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    AlpinistsEquipment(String itemName, double weight)
    Constructs an equipment item without a known price or description.
    AlpinistsEquipment(String itemName, double weight, String description)
    Constructs an equipment item without a known price.
    AlpinistsEquipment(String itemName, double weight, String description, double price)
    Constructs an equipment item with a known price.
